Name: Admin Password
Description: Admin password of your server instance.

Name: Max Player Count
Description: Maximum authorized amount of playes on your server instance.

Name: Server Region
Description: Server region to be displayed in the server browser.

Name: Game Map
Description: Starting path of the map you want to load on your server intance. The button contain a few known map path for easier setup.

Name: Sudo Super Admin List
Description: List of steam ID to be Sudo super admins on your servers. Leave it empty if you do not use Sudo.

Name: Maximum Tick Rate
Description: Maximum tick rate of your server instance.

Name: Use All Cores
Description: Supposed to improve performance on machines with lots of cores, unverified. Probably black magic.

Name: CPU Thread Affinity
Description: CPU Thread Affinity help to assign specific cores to the server process.

Name: Display Log Console
Description: Display server live logs instead of a blank window.

Name: Enable RCON
Description: Enable RCON on your server instance.
